title: how_to_use
content:
- click on a folder to see its content

 - if the folder is locked, decrypt its password from passwords folder in the decrypt terminal

 - if you want to go back, click on the back button

 - to see the projects on github go to projects_links

title: projects
content:
1. AI ChatBot
 - connected to my github
 - can answer anything about me

2. Functional Social Media
 - can post,comment,like,rate,etc
 - recommendation algorithm

3. Cryptographic algorithm
 - using Feistel Network and CBC

4. Interactive Portfolio
 - uses certain parts of (1 & 3)

5. Private medical system
 - is not publicly available
